live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45142.summary: Some customers in the Saint Vital and Southglen area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45142.title: Dec 18 - Winnipeg  (Saint Vital and Southglen) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
